question: Which among the following is an example of Cross selling?
option1: A sales person suggests a product or service to a person who lives in neighborhood of one of the clients
option2: A sales person suggests a premium brand of whisky, when the customer is buying a local made liquor
option3: A person suggests a new product or service to an old client of the company
option4: A person sales an extensive annual maintenance contract when the customer buys a product.
answer: A person suggests a new product or service to an old client of the company
